reviews.review_body: it is really good product. Got super fast delivery, Great Packing and Taking daily to reduce my weight. Taste is also very good.

First I recieved the tea as sample. After using it, I became fan of the product. Now It became my regular routine to drink. The taste of tea is also very good as compared to other brand herbel/green tea. Highly recommended.
Good taste.  Add a few drops of lemon if you like tangy lemony flavour.Great quality tea bags.  Staple free and unbleached filter paper.
Great taste good smell. Indeed a good product as of now.

Even though presentation of product is good,nice package it lacks special taste that required for green tea currently available in market.

It's such a nice product that I have recommended it to many colleagues in office. Its really best. Keep up the quality and pricing. It was a tough choice initially to decide on the organic or green tea. Finally I am happy that I chose Santulya. Best wishes and keep growing

reviews.review_title: Ginger and Turmeric  is the key for me in this product
reviews.review_body: I bought the 100 tea bags box and I liked that it has ginger and turmeric roots. I have recently had an issue with irregular periods and I did some research this month to see if there were any DIY tricks to help with it or any home remdies to try with using birth control pills (which was recommend by my doctor to make it more regular as a solution) and I thought that would not be good solution for me so I when I did my own research online, some sources stated that I should try digesting ginger to regulate menstrual periods. Anyway, I hope and pray that this works in sha Allah. I just bought this because it has ginger to help with this issue. I also use two tea bags in a coffee mug to help boost more flavor, scent and taste because its just my preferences when it comes to drinking tea.

I am not a huge ginger fan and it has ginger in it along with other items, but I am pleasantly surprised by how good this tea is.  The flavor is very mellow and smooth.  I have drank several cups of this tea and I am not seeing a huge different at this time, but I am also not feeling bad or having any negative effects either.  It is also very affordable and organic, both are pluses for me, especially the affordable part!  I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who likes to drink tea.
one the best teas ever. I would order more
I have two cups of this tea every single day. Quite enjoyable!
